problem_text:
Let S be a non-abelian finite simple group. Is it true that for any n ∈ N, if the set of class sizes of a centreless finite group G is the same as the set of class sizes of the direct power S^n, then G ≃ S^n?
This is proved for S = Alt_5 in (J. Algebra Appl., 21, no. 11 (2022), Article ID 2250226, 8 p.).
I. B. Gorshkov
